cash receipts history of
customers cash received from Cash Receipts
section.para: To view the history of Cash Receipts and their applications by Customer, select the "Cash Receipts" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: Prior to xTuple ERP version 3.3.0, Cash Receipt history was not retained for use by this screen. As a result, you will not see Cash Receipt history for any Cash Receipts entered prior to version 3.3.0. Since old Cash Receipt information is not available prior to version 3.3.0, the A/R Applications screen should be used until sufficient Cash Receipt history is accumulated.

section.para: When viewing Cash Receipts and their applications, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select all or specific Customers whose Cash Receipt details you want to display.

tip.para: To generate results in the display you first have to select the QUERY button. If you are not seeing any results, this is probably the reason why.

listitem.para: Specify a date range for Cash Receipt history you want to display:
Cash Receipts entered on and after this date will be displayed.
Cash Receipts entered on and before this date will be displayed.
Choose one of the following display options:
Select to order the results by the Cash Receipt applications. This functionality was not changed in xTuple ERP version 3.3.0â€”and so it operates in the same manner it did prior to that version.
Select to order the results by Cash Receipt. Only Cash Receipts entered in or after xTuple ERP version 3.3.0 will be shown. For older Cash Receipt history, see the A/R Applications screen.
Display lists Cash Receipt details, using the specified parameters.

note.para: The display will include unposted as well as posted Cash Receipts.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Select to create a new Cash Receipt.
Select to edit the specified unposted Cash Receipt or receivable item.
Select to view the specified Cash Receipt or receivable item.
Select to post the specified Cash Receipt.

Select to reverse (i.e., void) the specified posted Cash Receipt. When a Cash Receipt is voided, any applications will also be reversed. You may only reverse Cash Receipts entered in xTuple ERP version 3.3.0 or later.
